references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This work adapts the Transformer architecture for image processing, inspiring NeuroBOLT's approach to handling multi-dimensional EEG data.

references.paper_title: Large brain model for learning generic representations with tremendous EEG data in BCI
references.reason: NeuroBOLT leverages the pre-trained EEG foundation model, LaBraM, from this paper, which provides effective spatiotemporal representations for EEG data.

references.paper_title: Fine-grain atlases of functional modes for fmri analysis
references.reason: This study introduces the DiFuMo parcellation scheme used in NeuroBOLT to summarize fMRI signals into a set of brain regions for easier analysis.

references.paper_title: Eeg to fmri synthesis benefits from attentional graphs of electrode relationships
references.reason: This paper explores EEG-fMRI synthesis using deep learning, addressing similar challenges and providing a basis of comparison for NeuroBOLT's performance.
